items.name: Introducing ChatGPT Go, now available worldwide
items.summary: ChatGPT Go is now available worldwide, offering expanded access to GPT-5.2 Instant, higher usage limits, and longer memory—making advanced AI more affordable globally.

items.name: AWS Lambda announces cross-account access for DynamoDB Streams
items.summary:
AWS Lambda now supports cross-account access for AWS DynamoDB Streams event-source mappings (ESMs),
enabling you to trigger Lambda functions in one account from DynamoDB Streams in another account.
